definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to execute a lightning raid/(investment) to buy, then quickly sell/(tourism) to visit a destination for only a short stay

sentences.english: And then went up against the Mavericks.
sentences.chinese: 接着他們又殺進決賽，勇鬥小牛隊。

sentences.english: Saw the rest several later on live, indeed as expected, you all the way kill into 5 strong.
sentences.chinese: 隨後看了餘下的幾場直播，果然，你一路殺進5強。
